form.longName: PhenX PX181402 - Exposures To Violence Child Protocol
form.preferredDefinition: The respondent is asked a comprehensive list of questions about trauma and victimization experiences over his/her lifetime. If the respondent answers "yes" to the first question, the interviewer administers additional follow-up questions about the event. Follow-up questions collect information about the person's age, when the event occurred, whether serious injury or death was involved, if there was an intense feeling of fear and helplessness, the frequency of the event, and whether anyone else ever tried to harm the person in the same way. The questions are sensitive and cover subjects such as physical violence, sexual abuse, suicide, and murder.

headerInstruction.text: A "yes" or "no" response is all the information we are requesting from the respondent. We do not want to ask them details about what might have been a very painful experience. The question "were you in danger of death or serious physical injur..TRUNCATED

question.questionText: 1. Have you ever been involved in a natural disaster, like a tornado, a hurricane, a flood, or an earthquake? (pxt181402_natural_disaster)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_natural_disaster_age)
Were you very scared? (natural_disaster_scared)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (natural_disaster_afraid_might_die)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (natural_disaster_could_not_stop)
Was there another time you were involved in a natural disaster, like a tornado, hurricane, flood, or earthquake? (pxt181402_natural_disaster_other_time)
2. Have you ever been involved in a manmade disaster, like a fire, a train crash, a car accident, or a building falling down? (pxt181402_manmade_disaster)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_manmade_disaster_age)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (manmade_disaster_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (manmade_disaster_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (manmade_disaster_could_not_stop)
Was there another time you were involved in a manmade disaster, like a fire, a train crash, a car accident, or a building falling down? (pxt181402_manmade_disaster_other_time)
3. Have you ever fought in a war? (including police shootouts and gang fights) (war)
How old were you the first time it happened? (war_age)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (war_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (war_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (war_could_not_stop)
Was there another time where you fought in a war? (war_other_time)
4. Have you ever lived in a war zone? (For example, Iraq or Bosnia). (warzone)
How old were you the first time it happened? (warzone_age)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (warzone_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (warzone_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (warzone_could_not_stop)
Was there another time that you lived in a war zone? (For example, Iraq or Bosnia). (warzone_other_time)
5. Have you ever had a serious accident at home, at school, or somewhere else? (pxt181402_serious_accident)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_serious_accident_age)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (serious_accident_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (serious_accident_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (serious_accident_could_not_stop)
Was there another time you had a serious accident at home, at school, or somewhere else? (pxt181402_serious_accident_other_time)
6. Have you ever been exposed to dangerous chemicals or radioactivity? (pxt181402_chemicals_radiation)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_chemicals_radiation_age)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (chemicals_radiation_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (chemicals_radiation_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (chemicals_radiation_could_not_stop)
Was there another time you were exposed to dangerous chemicals or radioactivity? (pxt181402_chemicals_radiation_other_time)
7. Has anyone ever shot at you, stabbed you, hit you, kicked you, beaten you, punched you, slapped you around, or hurt your body in some other way? (shot_stabbed)
How old were you the first time it happened? (shot_stabbed_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (shot_stabbed_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (shot_stabbed_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (shot_stabbed_could_not_stop)
How many times did this person do this to you? (shot_stabbed_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (shot_stabbed_age_last_time)
8. Has anyone ever threatened to hurt you with any kind of a weapon, like a knife, a gun, a baseball bat, a frying pan, scissors, a stick, a rock or a bottle? (threatened_ever)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_threatened_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (threatened_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (threatened_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (threatened_could_not_stop)
How many times did this person do this to you? (pxt181402_threatened_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (pxt181402_threatened_age_last_happened)
Has anyone else ever threatened to hurt you with any kind of a weapon? (pxt181402_threatened_other_times)
9. Has anyone ever threatened to hurt you when they were standing right in front of you? (threatened_standinginfrontof)
How old were you the first time it happened? (threatened_standinginfrontof_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (threatened_standinginfrontof_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (threatened_standinginfrontof_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (threatened_standinginfrontof_could_not_stop)
How many times did this person do this to you? (threatened_standinginfrontof_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (threatened_standinginfrontof_age_last_happened)
Has anyone else ever threatened to hurt you when they were standing right in front of you? (threatened_standinginfrontof_other_times)
10. Has anyone ever actually hurt you with any kind of a weapon, like a knife, a gun, a baseball bat, a frying pan, scissors, a stick, a rock, or a bottle? (hurtbyweapon)
How old were you the first time it happened? (hurtbyweapon_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (hurtbyweapon_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (hurtbyweapon_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (hurtbyweapon_nothing_could_do)
How many times did this person do this to you? (hurtbyweapon_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (hurtbyweapon_age_last_happened)
Has anyone else ever actually hurt you with any kind of a weapon, like a knife, a gun, a baseball bat, a frying pan, scissors, a stick, a rock, or a bottle? (hurtbyweapon_other_times)
11. Before you turned 12 years old (when you were in grade school), did anyone ever hit you, kick you, beat you, punch you, slap you around, or hurt your body in some other way? (hurt_before12)
How old were you the first time it happened? (hurt_before12_age_firsthappened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (hurt_before12_afraid_mightdie)
Were you very scared? (hurt_before12_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (hurt_before12_nothingcoulddo)
How many times did this person do this to you? (hurt_before12_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (hurt_before12_age_lasthappened)
Before you turned 12, did anyone else ever hit you, kick you, beat you, punch you, slap you around, or hurt your body in some other way? (hurt_before12_other_times)
12. Before you turned 12 years old (when you were in grade school), were you ever physically abused? (pxt181402_physicallyabused_before12)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_physicallyabused_before12_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (physicallyabused_before12_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (physicallyabused_before12_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (physicallyabused_before12_nothing_could_do)
How many times did this person do this to you? (pxt181402_physicallyabused_before12_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (pxt181402_physicallyabused_before12_age_last_happened)
Before you turned 12, did anyone else ever physically abuse you? (pxt181402_physicallyabused_before12_other_times)

13. Has anyonemale or femaleever forced or pressured you into doing something sexual that you didn't want to do? By something sexual we mean someone putting an object or part of their body inside your private sexual parts, inside your rear end, or inside your mouth we also mean someone putting your private parts inside their mouth. (something_sexual)
How old were you the first time it happened? (something_sexual_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (something_sexual_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (something_sexual_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (something_sexual_nothing_could_do)
How many times did this person do this to you? (something_sexual_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (something_sexual_age_last_happened)
Has anyone elsemale or femaleever forced or pressured you into doing something sexual that you didn't want to do? (something_sexual_other_times)

14. Other than what we just talked about, have there been any other times when anyone, male or female, ever tried to force or bully you into doing something sexual that you didn't want to do, but it didn't end up happening (for example, you stopped them or someone else stopped them)? (something_sexual_stopped)
How old were you the first time it happened? (somethingsexualstopped_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (somethingsexualstopped_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (somethingsexualstoppedscared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (somethingsexualstopped_nothing_could_do)
How many times did this person do this to you? (somethingsexualstopped_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (somethingsexualstopped_age_last_happened)

Was there any other time when anyone, male or female, tried to force or bully you into doing something sexual that you didn't want to do, but it didn't end up happening? (somethingsexualstopped_other_times)

15. Other than what we just talked about, have there been any other times when anyone actually touched private parts of your body or made you touch theirs when you didn't want to? (pxt181402_private_parts)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_private_parts_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (private_parts_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (private_parts_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (private_parts_nothing_could_do)
How many times did this person do this to you? (pxt181402_private_parts_times)
How old were you the last time this person did this to you? (pxt181402_private_parts_age_last_happened)
Has anyone else ever actually touched private parts of your body or made you touch theirs when you didn't want to? (pxt181402_private_parts_other_times)
16. Have you ever known someone who was murdered that is, a parent, a brother, a sister, a very close friend, a boyfriend or girlfriend, or someone who lived with you? (murdered)
How old were you the first time it happened? (murdered_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (murdered_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (murdered_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (murdered_nothing_could_do)
Was anyone else murdered who was a parent, a brother, a sister, a very close friend, a boyfriend or girlfriend, or someone who lived with you? (murdered_other_times)
17. Have you ever seen or been present when someone was murdered or hurt very badly? (witnessed_murder)
How old were you the first time it happened? (witnessed_murder_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (witnessed_murder_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (witnessed_murder_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (witnessed_murder_nothing_could_do)
Was there any other time when you saw or were present when someone was murdered or hurt very badly? (witnessed_murder_other_times)

18. Have you ever known someone who committed suicide or killed themselves that is, a parent, a sister, a brother, a very close friend, a boyfriend or girlfriend, or someone who lived with you? (suicide)
How old were you the first time it happened? (suicide_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (suicide_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (suicide_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (suicide_nothing_could_do)
Did anyone else who was a parent, a sister, a brother, a very close friend, a boyfriend or girlfriend, or someone who lived with you commit suicide or kill themselves? (suicide_other_times)
19. Have you ever seen a dead body? Don't include at a funeral, on TV, in the movies, or in a newspaper. (pxt181402_dead_body)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_dead_body_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (dead_body_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (dead_body_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (dead_body_nothing_could_do)
Was there any other time when you saw a dead body? (pxt181402_dead_body_other_times)
20. Have you ever seen or heard another person be threatened with a weapon (for example, a gun or a knife)? (witnessed_threats)
How old were you the first time it happened? (witnessed_threats_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (witnessed_threats_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (witnessed_threats_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (witnessed_threats_nothing_could_do)
Was there any other time when you saw or heard another person be threatened with a weapon (for example, a gun or a knife)? (witnessed_threats_other_times)
21. Have you ever seen or heard another person be raped, sexually attacked, or made to do something sexual that they didn't want to do? (pxt181402_witnessed_sexualattack)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_witnessed_sexualattack_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (witnessed_sexualattack_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (witnessed_sexualattack_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (witnessed_sexualattack_nothing_could_do)
Was there any other time when you saw or heard another person be raped, sexually attacked, or made to do something sexual that they didn't want to do? (pxt181402_witnessed_sexualattack_other_times)
22. Has anyone ever damaged or destroyed something on purpose that belonged to you or to someone who you lived with? (pxt181402_destroyed_property)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_destroyed_property_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (destroyed_property_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (destroyed_property_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (destroyed_property_nothing_could_do)
Has anyone else damaged or destroyed something on purpose that belonged to you or to someone who you lived with? (destroyed_property_no2_219)
23. Has anyone else ever stolen something from you by using force or threatening to hurt you, like in a stickup, a mugging, or a carjacking? (pxt181402_stolen_property_other_times)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_destroyed_p2_710)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (destroyed_property_af2_f35)
Were you very scared? (destroyed_property_sc2_cb9)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (destroyed_property_no2_de3)
Has anyone else ever stolen something from you by using force or threatening to hurt you, like in a stickup, a mugging, or a carjacking? (destroyed_property_no2_b71)

24. Has anyone ever tried to steal something from you by using force or threatening to hurt you? This could be something like a stickup, mugging, or carjacking. But they didn't get anything because you or someone else stopped them? (pxt181402_tried_to_steal)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_tried_tosteal_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (tried_tosteal_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (tried_tosteal_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (tried_tosteal_nothing_could_do)

Has anyone else ever tried to steal something from you by using force or threatening to hurt you, like in a stickup, a mugging, or a carjacking, but they didn't end up stealing something (for example, you stopped them or someone else stopped them)? (pxt181402_tried_tosteal_other_times)
25. Has anyone ever tried to or actually broken into your house, garage, shed, locker or storage room when you were not there? (pxt181402_break_in)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_break_in_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (break_in_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (break_in_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (break_in_nothing_could_do)
Has anyone else ever tried to or actually broken into your house, garage, shed, locker or storage room when you were not there? (pxt181402_breakin)
26. Has anyone ever tried to or actually broken into your house, garage, shed, locker or storage room when you were there? (pxt181402_break_in_other_times)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_breakin_whilethere_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (breakin_whilethere_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (breakin_whilethere_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (breakin_whilethere_nothing_could_do)
Has anyone else ever tried to or actually broken into your house, garage, shed, locker or storage room when you were there? (pxt181402_breakin_whilethere_other_times)
27. Has anyone ever stolen something from you without your knowing it? This could be taking something from your pocket or backpack. (stolen_without_knowledge)
How old were you the first time it happened? (stolen_withoutknowledge_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (stolen_withoutknowledge_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (stolen_withoutknowledge_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (stolen_withoutknowledge_nothing_could_do)
Has anyone else ever stolen something directly from you without forcing you or threatening to hurt you? (stolen_withoutknowledge_other_times)
28. Have you ever been kidnapped or held captive? (pxt181402_kidnapped)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_kidnapped_age_first_happened)
How long were you held or not allowed to leave? (pxt181402_kidnapped_how_long)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (kidnapped_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (kidnapped_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (kidnapped_nothing_could_do)
Was there any other time when you were kidnapped or held captive? (pxt181402_kidnapped_other_times)
29. Have you ever been stalked by anyone? For example, has anyone ever spied on you or followed you when you didn't want them to? (pxt181402_stalked)
How old were you the first time it happened? (pxt181402_stalked_age_first_happened)
Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly? (stalked_afraid_might_die)
Were you very scared? (stalked_scared)
Did you feel like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (stalked_nothing_could_do)
How many times did this person do this to you? (stalked_times)
How old were you the last time this person stalked you? (pxt181402_stalked_age_last_happened)
Has anyone else stalked you, spied on you, or followed you when you didn't want them to? (pxt181402_stalked_other_times)

30. Have you ever been in any other situation in which you were afraid you might die or get really badly hurt, or when you were very scared or felt like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (pxt181402_other_situations)

Have you ever been in any other situation in which you were afraid you might die or get really badly hurt, or when you were very scared or felt like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? SPECIFY (pxt181402_other_situations_specify)
How old were you the first time it happened? (other_situations_age_first_happened)

Was there any other situation in which you were afraid you might die or get really badly hurt, or when you were very scared or felt like there was nothing you could do to stop what was happening? (pxt181402_other_situations2)

There are several ways to score the instrument, from very simple to more complex. One can simply count the number of events that the person endorsed, the total number of events (that is, if the event happened more than once) or the number of items of different types (general traumas, items 16 physical violence, items 710 physical abuse, items 1112 sexual violence, items 1315 seen family/friend murdered or commit suicide, items 1618 witnessed trauma to someone else, items 1921 crime victimization, items 2227 kidnapped or stalked, items 2829 or anything else, item 30). One can count items that occurred during certain time periods in the person's life (childhood, adolescence, or adulthood) or items that only reached a certain threshold of intensity, based on questions about the person's perception of the event (i.e., Were you afraid that you might die or get hurt really badly?). For certain purposes where less detail is desired, one might omit these followup questions entirely. (scoring_0181402)

protocol.preferredDefinition: The respondent is asked a comprehensive list of questions about trauma and victimization experiences over his/her lifetime. If the respondent answers "yes" to the first question, the interviewer administers additional follow-up questions about the event. Follow-up questions collect information about the person's age, when the event occurred, whether serious injury or death was involved, if there was an intense feeling of fear and helplessness, the frequency of the event, and whether anyone else ever tried to harm the person in the same way. The questions are sensitive and cover subjects such as physical violence, sexual abuse, suicide, and murder.
